review.reviewbody:
The current ePub and Mobi editions available at this page had a lot of formatting issues (it seemed more like plain text). So, I went ahead and created both editions myself using www.faqs.org/docs/artu/ as the source. Downloads available at:
ePub: https://www.dropbox.com/s/emswk2u9pexu4s0/taoup-esr.epub?dl=0
Mobi: https://www.dropbox.com/s/jieu5z4nqry1tm2/taoup-esr.mobi?dl=0
Will try to upload these here.
very good book. great thanks for making it free!!!
